title: Gen AI Customer Support Automation
description: Built end-to-end GenAI-driven customer support automation system during Accolite x Bounteous internship using n8n, GPT-4, and Supabase Vector DB (RAG), automating 60% of routine inquiries. Implemented semantic search and sentiment-aware personalization, reducing handle time by 40% and improving First Contact Resolution by 15%.

title: ML Under the Hood: Interactive ML Visualization Platform
description: Collaborated in team of 6 to build interactive ML visualization platform demonstrating K-Means, PCA, Linear Regression, and EM algorithms with step-by-step tracing. Developed React + TypeScript frontend with D3.js/Plotly.js visualizations and FastAPI backend, deployed on Render cloud platform.

title: Airfoil Self-Noise Prediction: Advanced ML Analysis
description: Mentored team of 4 students at ACM AI @ UCSD in comprehensive ML analysis of NASA airfoil self-noise dataset (1,503 samples). Guided team to achieve R² = 0.949 using optimized XGBoost with Bayesian optimization, SHAP analysis for interpretability, and 5-fold cross-validation for aerospace engineering applications.

title: Steam Game Recommendation System
description: Built recommendation system using LLM-enhanced semantic features (SBERT embeddings) and collaborative filtering, achieving 0.93 AUC-ROC. Engineered 384-dimensional semantic embeddings from game descriptions and implemented deep learning models with comprehensive evaluation using Precision@K, Recall@K, and AUC-ROC.

title: Study Buddy AI: Cloud-Native Distributed AI System
description: Deployed AI-powered study assistant with Kubernetes (Minikube) and Docker, orchestrating scalable microservices in a Linux environment. Automated CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and ArgoCD (GitOps), integrating LangChain-driven NLP features and end-to-end DevOps workflow. Enhanced observability via improved logging, resource labels, and deployment documentation.

title: Mood-Based Music Recommendation System
description: Led team of 4 to win 1st place at DS3 Showcase. Built emotion-aware music recommendation system processing 2,000 songs using RoBERTa transformer for YouTube comment analysis. Achieved 10x performance improvement (200ms→20ms) through optimized K-means clustering and deployed on AWS Elastic Beanstalk.

title: The Seismic Lottery: Earthquake Impact Visualization
description: Won Best Project & People's Choice Awards (top 8% of 182 students) in DSC 106. Interactive 3D visualization using D3.js v7 demonstrating infrastructure's role in disaster impact with 60fps performance.

title: Stock Price Prediction with Deep Learning
description: Collaborated with Triton Quantitative Trading club to build ensemble system combining LSTM, GRU, and hybrid architectures achieving 82.4% R² score. Integrated VADER sentiment analysis and Monte Carlo simulations.

title: RideRipple: Tracing Boston's Bike Currents
description: Data visualization project analyzing Boston's bike-sharing patterns and traffic flow using Hubway data. Created interactive visualizations to trace cycling patterns across the city.

title: Apple Financial Chatbot using LangChain
description: Developed RAG-powered chatbot to analyze Apple's 10-K filings using LangChain and Hugging Face, achieving 85% response accuracy with context-aware NLP and vector embeddings.

title: Power Outage Prediction: Climate Analysis
description: Built ML pipeline processing 1,540 outage records with Random Forest classifier achieving 75.41% accuracy. Implemented NMAR missingness analysis and validated model fairness across demographic groups.

title: Family Feud Game
description: Python-based implementation of the popular Family Feud game show with interactive gameplay features and scoring system.

title: Image Processing Application
description: Python application for image manipulation and processing with various filters and transformations including edge detection, blur effects, and color adjustments.

title: Mammogram Mass Detection Project
description: Machine learning project for detecting masses in mammogram images using Jupyter Notebook, implementing classification algorithms for medical imaging analysis.

title: Coding Assistant
description: AI-powered coding assistant built with Python to help developers with code suggestions, syntax correction, and debugging assistance.

title: Monte Carlo Stock Simulator
description: Streamlit application for simulating future stock prices using Brownian motion and Monte Carlo methods with adjustable volatility and drift parameters.
